alert.note: Alert for Converse; Niobrara (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:58PM MDT until July 17 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... East central Converse County in east central Wyoming... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 457 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Manning Ranch, or 31 miles northeast of Douglas, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lance Creek, Redbird and Manning Ranch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
